definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: My daughter is an engineer in Cornel, and that's their dorm.
sentences.chinese: 我的女兒是康奈爾大學的工程師，這是他們的宿舍。

sentences.english: Bustamante, a professor of computational biology at Cornell University.
sentences.chinese: 康奈爾大學計算生物學教授巴斯塔曼特這樣說。

sentences.english: Dr. Xiaojing Ma of Cornell University Medical College announces the winners of the lucky draw.
sentences.chinese: 康奈爾大學醫學院馬小京教授爲幸運觀衆抽獎。

sentences.english: I decided to come to Cornell for a number of reasons.
sentences.chinese: 我決定來康奈爾大學有很多原因。

sentences.english: Cornel University is the third college I visited in New York.
sentences.chinese: 康奈爾大學是我在紐約探訪的第三所大學。

sentences.english: And she received a PHD electro-engineering from Cornell.
sentences.chinese: 並獲得了康奈爾大學電子工程系的博士學位。

sentences.english: The work at Cornell is testing hypotheses of insect propulsion and control.
sentences.chinese: 在康奈爾大學的工作是測試昆蟲的推進力和可控性。

sentences.english: Prasad, a professor of trade policy at Cornell University.
sentences.chinese: Prasad說，“他是康奈爾大學的貿易政策教授。

sentences.english: I also am fortunate enough to be part of our Park Fellowship Program here at Cornell,
sentences.chinese: 我很榮幸能成爲康奈爾大學帕克獎學金項目的一員。

sentences.english: Check it out for yourself here, from Cornell University Library.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在康奈爾大學實驗室的論文庫中找到它。
